pageContext.description: Dimensions: EL 55.0; EW 36.0; Max. th. 6.3; Wt. 37.5 g,Typology: hollowed edge bevels - diffuse line,Condition: butt end slightly bent,Attached Material: fair amount of yellowy soil traces.
